body: OH MY GOSH WHAT? This has like 4 pages of porn and it's all just a MASTERPIECE. Oh my gosh this was so good
holy shit this was a parody, i didnt realise till i saw the comment lol. the world building is great, gonna give this one a watch
This is day 1 of NNN.I think I will survive by reading wholesome doujin like this
Reading this after watching the movie is a whole new experience
Multi-work-series ?? I need the rest, anyone knows sauce??!!!!

This is too pure, and has excellent writing. The fact that this beautiful work of art managed to make it onto this site is a welcome change. Hopefully the author gets the respect they deserve for being able to tell a well crafted short story.
I showed page 14 of this to my brother once. He asked me which manga was this, I told him it was the “hentai fanart” of Hibike Euphonium, and he was like “WOT!?”.
Right in the feels and the page 14 was super good👍👍👍
It it was to hard to talk to but it made me smile
I really like this kind of relationship in yuri...... No, i love it!!! And the ending that "time for an i love yoy hug" really makes me happy i hope they make more these kind of yuri doujin♥️

I can't fap at all.
This is just so damn beautiful.
This is so wholesome. Beautiful art as well.
